title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, May 6, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss writes from the battlefield at Chancellorsville, describing the battle, the death of his tent-mate, and the wounding of General Jackson, who lost his arm.
keywords: Battle Description, Military Authority, Church/Religious Activity, Death/Casualties, Prisons/Prisoners, American Civil War
